title: Happy Birthday, Riko-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>So busy, so busy.... Hey, Hanayo-chan, Nico-san, where is the box that was.... Huh? Hanayo-chan? Nico-saaan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Happy birthday, Riko!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>It’s a macaron tower~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Eeeh!? Umm.... Thank you, both of you....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>What’s with that face? Did you think we forgot about your birthday?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>B-, but, we’re currently busy preparing for the joint event, so....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>That doesn’t mean we would forget~. Here, Riko-san, blow out the candles!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>*Fooo*~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Happy birthday!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Happy birthday!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, thanks again, you two! This is a very wonderful celebration for me♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
